itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, June 7, 2013
contentencoded:
President Obama is set to meet Chinese President Xi Jinping today in California. The leaders' first meeting will likely cover topics ranging from North Korea to cybersecurity and trade. Also on the docket? Getting to know each other.

Marketplace China Bureau Chief Rob Schmitz joins Morning Report host David Brancaccio from Shanghai to discuss.
title: Getting to know all about you: Obama and Xi meet
description: President Obama is set to meet Chinese President Xi Jinping today in California. The leaders' first meeting will likely cover topics ranging from North Korea to cybersecurity and trade. Also on the docket? Getting to know each other.
